title: Peak power demand at record high of 246.1 GW on Wednesday
description: India's peak power demand reached a record 246.1 GW, surpassing the previous record set in September. The heatwave conditions in the northwest and central parts of the country have led to a sharp surge in demand for electricity. The government expects peak demand to be available in a day, and Delhi recorded its highest ever peak of 8,302 MW.
